creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Taoist priest robe of medium blue satin wit back and shoulders solidly embroidered with couched gold threads.  Conventional designs in gold thread and couched twist in colors.  Borders of faded brick satin solidly embroidered in couched gold threads and couched twist in colors.  Soiled and worn. Jade     buckle in front.  Lining of coarse blue cotton.  Strips of peacock blue silk added to arm border.
title: Taoist robe
